message: - fixed NPE when reading odd-length array of one-byte base types

PLC4X-84 - NPE when reading Marker

- Made the protocol throw an exception if an unknown memory area is referenced.
now UNKNOWN rather than null adn null can give rise to NPEs
- Added a Maven extension for profiling the goal execution times (But disabled till a NPE issue is fixed: https://github.com/khmarbaise/maven-buildtime-profiler/issues/8)
